_header: Saint Luke in his lesson will lere
_description: Gospel for the Friday after the Fifteenth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint luke in his lesson will lereWhils ihesus crist welk in þis werld here…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And so forto farsake oure sinþat we may till his welthes win
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Rogabat iesum quidam phariseus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi proxima secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 120va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.119-128.
